stringSearcher

Class SequentialStringSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • stringSearcher.StringSearcher
      • stringSearcher.SequentialStringSearcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SequentialSearcherSubstringSizeTimer, SequentialSearcherSuperstringSizeTimer

    public class SequentialStringSearcher
extends StringSearcher
    Implements the simple sequential substring search algorithm
    Version:
    October 2019
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

    • Method Detail

      • occursIn

        public int occursIn(char[] superstring)
             throws NotFound
        Does this string occur in the superstring?
        Specified by:
        occursIn in class StringSearcher
        Parameters:
        superstring - the superstring to be searched
        Returns:
        the index of the leftmost occurrence of this string in the superstring, if there is such an occurrence
        Throws:
        NotFound - iff this string does not occur in the superstring

      • occursAt

        private boolean occursAt(char[] superstring,
                         int index)
        Try to match this string to the superstring at the given index.
        Parameters:
        superstring - the superstring we are looking in.
        index - the index at which to start looking
        Returns:
        true iff the superstring segment starting at the given index matches this string
